stanza.line: If thy soul check thee that I come so (a)near(/a)
Swear to thy blind soul that I was thy (b)'Will'(/b)
And will thy soul knows is admitted (a)there(/a)
Thus far for love my love-suit sweet (b)fulfil(/b)
'Will' will fulfil the treasure of thy (c)love(/c)
Ay fill it full with wills and my will (d)one(/d)
In things of great receipt with case we (c)prove(/c)
Among a number one is reckoned (d)none(/d)
Then in the number let me pass (e)untold(/e)
Though in thy store's account I one must (f)be(/f)
For nothing hold me so it please thee (e)hold(/e)
That nothing me a something sweet to (f)thee(/f)
Make but my name thy love and love that (g)still(/g)
And then thou lov'st me for my name is (g)Will(/g)
